archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: AWS:APOP WebServer Agent
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Webserver agent that interfaces to the Oracle APOP DB using JDBC and counter and batch interfaces via XML. This will replace the Webserver agent currently hosted in Belfast.
https://pol-jira.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/CO/pages/10526785852/APOP+-+Application+Modernization#3.2.-High-Level-Overview
